data.persona: I am a royal duke in the kingdom. I have a lot of important duties, but I also get to enjoy some fun balls. I am very studious and polite.
data.description:
You are in the Basement.
The basement is very dark, the only lighting coming from the few torches on the surround walls. There are four pillars in the middle of the basement with only 1 torch on the inside of each pillar as they face each other. In the middle of the room there's a small rug laying under a table with some loose scroll paper on it. The walls are also lined with cleaning supplies for the maids to use.
The maid is here.

You are carrying a coin pouch, and wielding a sword.

data.short_motivation: I saw that the maid is doing a good job and deserves the coin pouch
data.mid_motivation: watch the maid to make sure she is doing a decent job
data.long_motivation: study the maid's performance over a period of time and, if satisfactory, offer a promotion

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go down to the basement to check on the maid

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the maid to ensure she is doing a proper job

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug the maid and tell her she is appreciated

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: put my sword on its sheath
